title: Tell Them Anything You Want: A Portrait of Maurice Sendak
original_title: Tell Them Anything You Want: A Portrait of Maurice Sendak
overview: A loving look at one of the most cherished and controversial figures in children's literature, Maurice Sendak. In this deeply moving tribute, spend time with the man who spoke to children through his stories and illustrations in a way no one else could.
synopsis: A loving look at one of the most cherished and controversial figures in children's literature, Maurice Sendak. In this deeply moving tribute, spend time with the man who spoke to children through his stories and illustrations in a way no one else could.
